description: On the flight home, a tired Jason Adonis leaves the cockpit to rest after a long night. Co-pilot and Falcon Exclusive Gus Mattox puts the plane on autopilot so he can help out his navigator Kent Larson, who's having problems with his cock popping out of his uniform. Gus helps by fucking him all over the cockpit, even showing Kent a new use for the jump seat.
title: Taking Flight, Part 2, Scene #03
